metadata.title: Wednesday, 25th November, 2015
metadata.session: FIFTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a)    when the construction of the Kalabo-Sikongo road up to the Angolan Border will commence; and
(b)    what has caused the delay in commencing the project.

questions.minister: Minister of Energy and Water Development
parts: (a)    when the construction of a fuel filling station in Mporokoso District will commence;
(b)    why contracts to construct fuel filling stations in Luwingu and Mporokoso Districts were awarded to one contractor;
(c)    what the time-frame for completion of each project is; and
(d)    what the cost of each project is.
